items.sentence: Tom says he\'ll do that regardless of the consequences.
Tom says he\'s going to grow more vegetables this year.
Tom had trouble believing that Mary actually liked him.
Tom has been accused of selling classified information.
This is the first time Tom has ever sung with our band.
Some stores will give you a discount if you ask for it.
We all took it for granted that Tom could speak French.
I didn\'t realize that Tom and Mary used to be married.
Tom demanded that Mary give him the money she owed him.
I think we would\'ve lost if our team had played yours.
